desc: Good4Earth was founded by women of color with the goal of nurturing future generations by making our earth a better place. We created a virtual community of earth loving consumers, green startups, and nonprofits dedicated to fighting climate change through our app. We help people easily measure their impact on the env

layout.text: What's good for the earth, is good for you
Join our beta program for early insights and to network with other earth-loving people!
